message.content:
cs.DC, cs.Distributed, cs.OS, cs.CR, cs.NI. 

The paper discusses a non-invasive approach for extending existing cloud platforms to include checkpoint-restart capability, which is related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and cloud computing (cs.Distributed, cs.OS). The paper also discusses fault tolerance (cs.CR) and health monitoring (cs.NI) mechanisms. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.DC, followed by cs.Distributed and cs.OS. The paper also discusses checkpointing and fault tolerance, which are related to cs.CR. Finally, the paper discusses health monitoring, which is related to cs.NI.
